sentences.sContent: She wrote hymns to the gods in cuneiform.
sentences.sContent_eng: She wrote hymns to the gods in cuneiform.
sentences.sCn: 她用楔形文字写下了献给神祇的颂歌。

sentences.sContent: The first true writing we know of is Sumerian cuneiform- consisting mainly of wedge-shaped impressions on clay tablets - whichwas used more than 5000 years ago in Mesopotamia.
sentences.sContent_eng: The first true writing we know of is Sumerian cuneiform- consisting mainly of wedge-shaped impressions on clay tablets - whichwas used more than 5000 years ago in Mesopotamia.
sentences.sCn: 楔形文字是世界上已知最古老的文字。 这是一种刻在陶片上的文字，它的使用者是5000多年以前生活在美索不达米亚平原上的人们。

synos.tran: [解剖][生物]楔形的；楔形文字的；楔状骨的
